page.title: 20HOUSEWIFE IN SPETISBURY
page.content: My day begins around 7.OOa.m. and consists of breakfasting the children and taking them to school,then returning home to tackle washing-up and housework.This plus washing and baking occupies me until lunchtime. Then there is the evening meal to prepare,and perhaps some gardening or ironing before collecting the children from school.This is the'Children's Hour'or 2!When my husband arrives home we have our evening meal and'Family time'followed by the children's bath and bedtime.Evenings are a mixture of other little unfinished jobs,sewing, knitting,etc.before bedtime.This is my typical day-add to this social visits, visitors,shopping,village,church and school commitments,secretarial work for my husband's business,plus 1O1 other things which make my day!
